script.name: lib.xml.add.data
script.sourceplaintext:
@ $lookup.table = [THIS] -> call script lib.xml.getdatatypes : Type='all' @ $int.types = [THIS] -> call script lib.xml.getdatatypes : Type='int'
$datatype = datatype[ $a.data ] $tab.str = sprintf: pageid=[Page.Menus] textid=1104787, null, null, null, null, null $do.indent = $a.indent while $do.indent dec $do.indent = if $indent.str $indent.str = $indent.str + $tab.str else $indent.str = $tab.str end end
if not is datatype[ $a.data ] == DATATYPE_NULL if is datatype[ $a.data ] == DATATYPE_TABLE $doEnd = [FALSE] $tag = 'table' $arguments = table alloc $value = size of table $a.data $arguments['size'] = $value gosub sub.StartTag gosub sub.AddLine
$do.indent = $a.indent + 1
$key = get next key: table=$a.data key=null while $key $data = $a.data[$key] @ $a.xmlData = [THIS] -> call script lib.xml.add.data : Name=$key Data=$data XML Data=$a.xmlData Indent=$do.indent $key = get next key: table=$a.data key=$key end
gosub sub.EndTag gosub sub.AddLine
else if is datatype[ $a.data ] == DATATYPE_ARRAY $doEnd = [FALSE] $tag = 'array' $arguments = table alloc $value = size of array $a.data $arguments['size'] = $value gosub sub.StartTag gosub sub.AddLine
$do.indent = $a.indent + 1
$size = size of array $a.data $i = 0 while $i < $size $data = $a.data[$i] $key = sprintf: fmt='%s', $i, null, null, null, null @ $a.xmlData = [THIS] -> call script lib.xml.add.data : Name=$key Data=$data XML Data=$a.xmlData Indent=$do.indent inc $i = end
gosub sub.EndTag gosub sub.AddLine
else $tag = 'data' $arguments = table alloc if is datatype[ $a.name ] == DATATYPE_SECTOR $value = $a.name -> get universe x index $arguments['name.x'] = $value $value = $a.name -> get universe y index $arguments['name.y'] = $value $tag = 'sector' else if is datatype[ $a.name ] == DATATYPE_WARE $value = get maintype of ware $a.name $arguments['name.main'] = $value $value = get subtype of ware $a.name $arguments['name.sub'] = $value $tag = 'ware' else if is datatype[ $a.name ] == DATATYPE_RACE $tag = 'race' $a.name = get race id for race: $a.name else if is datatype[ $a.name ] == DATATYPE_OBJECT $tag = 'object' $a.name = $a.name -> serialise object else if is datatype[ $a.name ] == DATATYPE_SHIP $tag = 'object' $a.name = $a.name -> serialise object else if is datatype[ $a.name ] == DATATYPE_STATION $tag = 'object' $a.name = $a.name -> serialise object else if is datatype[ $a.name ] == DATATYPE_AGENT $tag = 'object' $a.name = $a.name -> serialise object else if is datatype[ $a.name ] == DATATYPE_PASSENGER $tag = 'object' $a.name = $a.name -> serialise object else if is datatype[ $a.name ] == DATATYPE_DEALER $tag = 'object' $a.name = $a.name -> serialise object else if is datatype[ $a.name ] == DATATYPE_MERCHANT $tag = 'object' $a.name = $a.name -> serialise object end $doEnd = [TRUE] $datatype = datatype[ $a.data ] $arguments['type'] = $datatype if is datatype[ $a.data ] == DATATYPE_SECTOR $value = $a.data -> get universe x index $arguments['data.x'] = $value $value = $a.data -> get universe y index $arguments['data.y'] = $value $data = $a.data else if is datatype[ $a.data ] == DATATYPE_WARE $value = get maintype of ware $a.data $arguments['data.main'] = $value $value = get subtype of ware $a.data $arguments['data.sub'] = $value $data = $a.data else if is datatype[ $a.data ] == DATATYPE_RACE $data = get race id for race: $a.data else if is datatype[ $a.data ] == DATATYPE_OBJECT $data = $a.data -> serialise object else if is datatype[ $a.data ] == DATATYPE_SHIP $data = $a.data -> serialise object else if is datatype[ $a.data ] == DATATYPE_STATION $data = $a.data -> serialise object else if is datatype[ $a.data ] == DATATYPE_AGENT $data = $a.data -> serialise object else if is datatype[ $a.data ] == DATATYPE_PASSENGER $data = $a.data -> serialise object else if is datatype[ $a.data ] == DATATYPE_DEALER $data = $a.data -> serialise object else if is datatype[ $a.data ] == DATATYPE_MERCHANT $data = $a.data -> serialise object else if $int.types[$datatype] $data = change datatype[$a.data] to DATATYPE_INT else $data = $a.data gosub sub.ConvertData end $arguments['data'] = $data gosub sub.StartTag gosub sub.AddLine end end
return $a.xmlData
sub.EndTag: $dataLine = '</' + $tag + '>' endsub
sub.StartTag: $dataLine = '<' + $tag if $a.name gosub sub.ConvertName $dataLine = $dataLine + ' name="' + $name + '"' end if $arguments $key = get next key: table=$arguments key=null while $key $arg.data = $arguments[$key] $dataLine = $dataLine + ' ' + $key + '="' + $arg.data + '"' $key = get next key: table=$arguments key=$key end end $arguments = table alloc if $doEnd $dataLine = $dataLine + '/>' else $dataLine = $dataLine + '>' end endsub
sub.AddLine: if $dataLine do if $indent.str $dataLine = $indent.str + $dataLine $dataLine = sprintf: pageid=[Page.Menus] textid=1104343, $dataLine, null, null, null, null if $a.xmlData $a.xmlData = $a.xmlData + $dataLine else $a.xmlData = $dataLine end end endsub
sub.ConvertName: $name.type = datatype[ $a.name ] $dataLine = $dataLine + ' nametype="' + $name.type + '"' $name = $a.name if is datatype[ $a.name ] == DATATYPE_WARE $value = get maintype of ware $a.name $dataLine = $dataLine + ' name.main="' + $value + '"' $value = get subtype of ware $a.name $dataLine = $dataLine + ' name.sub="' + $value + '"' else if $int.types[$name.type] $name = change datatype[$a.name] to DATATYPE_INT end endsub
sub.ConvertData: if $data -> exists $data = $data -> serialise object end endsub
return null
